name: Music Racer
shortDescription: A musical arcade game, where you race at full speed while dodging obstacles to the rhythm of the music.
description: Audis discover new music,new artists and mixes from all around the planet over Audius.org FREE API. Audius is a revolutionary open source API from audius.org. Enjoy this FREE App with no Ads or subscription.
